Package com.mongodb.client.model.mql

Interface MqlBoolean

All Superinterfaces:
MqlValue
@Sealed @Beta(CLIENT) public interface MqlBoolean extends MqlValue
A boolean value in the context of the MongoDB Query Language (MQL).
Since:
4.9.0
